languages.text: {n}Склонив голову, Паскаль тихо изрекает:{/n} "Это он. Наставник Амарнат".
{n}Pasqal lowers his head and says quietly,{/n} "That is him. My mentor. Amarnat."

languages.text: {n}パスカルは頭を低くして静かに語る。{/n}「彼です。我が師、アマルナト」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lowers his head and says quietly,{/n} "That is him. My mentor. Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは頭を低くして静かに語る。{/n}「彼です。我が師、アマルナト」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡低下头，平静地开了口。{/n}“肯定是他，我的导师，阿玛纳特。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lowers his head and says quietly,{/n} "That is him. My mentor. Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡低下头，平静地开了口。{/n}“肯定是他，我的导师，阿玛纳特。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal baisse la tête et vous glisse à l'oreille :{/n} « C'est lui. Mon mentor. Amarnat. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lowers his head and says quietly,{/n} "That is him. My mentor. Amarnat."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal baja la cabeza y dice con calma:{/n} «Es él, mi mentor, Amarnat».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lowers his head and says quietly,{/n} "That is him. My mentor. Amarnat."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal senkt den Kopf und sagt leise:{/n} "Das ist er. Mein Mentor. Amarnat."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal lowers his head and says quietly,{/n} "That is him. My mentor. Amarnat."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, başını eğip sessizce konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu o. Yönderim. Amarnat."
